title: Base Size (px)
description: Use this value to make the UI bigger or smaller.

title: Override Status Background Color
description: Override the background color of status chip. Set to White to disable.

title: Hide During Play
description: Hide the profile card when playing.

title: Hide During Result Screen
description: Hide the profile card during result screen.

title: Override User ID
description: Override the user displayed in the profile card to a different user.

title: Override User Title
description: Override the user's title displayed between username and badges. Leave empty to disable.

title: Override User Color
description: Override the background gradient color behind the avatar. Set to Black to disable.

title: Override Cover Image
description: Override the user's cover image displayed in the profile card. Leave empty to disable.

title: Override Rank Color
description: Override the gradient color for global rank number.
